title: 2021 Week 13 Preview + BTS is still here
itunes:title: 2021 Week 13 Preview + BTS is still here
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview every single upcoming game of Week 13, starting with the Broncos at Chiefs Sunday Night Football showdown. The heroes get into the draft with Gregg's selection of Chargers at Bengals, and Dan gets Marc to sing a few words with the BTS Army still lurking around SoFi Stadium.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
